Hi, I’m Joe Kroese or just jobi. I'm studying a masters in maths at the University of Manchester where I'm working on a network model of political repression and revolution.

I teach for Tutor Trust, an educational charity. I worked for aiPatient as Head of Software. I also make music, films and interactive art. Alsoalso i like to read books.

I like to spend time thinking about data, stories, justice and play.

Featured Projects

networks and revolution

My (ongoing) dissertation on how revolutions are like viruses but also different.

meet me halfway

a website to help you meet your friends, family and clandestine lovers more easily, more often and for less money. Taking the dates of travel and the locations of you and your missed one, it returns the cheapest places to meet and the price of the flights.

sunbodies

A zine about the ways we live in and play with our bodies in the summertime.

starlings

An agent-based model of starling murmurations.

closer

An interactive art piece using 3D sensors and projections.

Send me an email or do whatever one does on Twitter and LinkedIn. I’m also always happy to have new company on GitHub.
